hibernate-mapping.sql-query: Select * from STUDENT_TERM_MARK Where TERM_ID = ? and STUDENT_CLASS_INFO_ID = ?
hibernate-mapping.query:
Select termmark from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.GradeSubject gradeSubject, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo classinfo, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark termmark
where ((gradeSubject.grade.gradeId = ?) and (classinfo.classGrade.classGradeId = ?) and termmark.gradeSubjectId = gradeSubject.gradeSubjectId and termmark.studentClassInfoId = classinfo.studentClassInfoId)

Select termmark from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo classinfo, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark termmark
where ((classinfo.classGrade.classGradeId = ?) and (termmark.termId = ?) and (year(classinfo.year) = ?) and termmark.studentClassInfoId = classinfo.studentClassInfoId)

Select termmark from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark termmark
where termmark.studentTermMarkId in (:termMarkIdList)

Select termmark from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark termmark
where (termmark.gradeSubjectId = ? and termmark.studentClassInfoId = ?)

Select stm from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo sci, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark stm where sci.student.studentId = ? and year(sci.year) = ? and stm.studentClassInfoId = sci.studentClassInfoId
SELECT stm.marks FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark stm WHERE stm.studentClassInfoId =? AND stm.gradeSubjectId = ? AND stm.termId = ?
SELECT stm.studentTermMarkId FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark stm WHERE stm.studentClassInfoId = ? AND stm.gradeSubjectId = ? AND stm.termId = ?

Select stm from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo sci, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark stm where sci.student.studentId = ? and year(sci.year) = ? and stm.termId= ? and stm.studentClassInfoId = sci.studentClassInfoId
SELECT stm FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark stm WHERE stm.studentClassInfoId = ? AND stm.gradeSubjectId = ? AND stm.termId = ?
FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMark stm WHERE stm.studentClassInfoId =? AND stm.gradeSubjectId = ? AND stm.termId = ?
